name: Armed Criers of Verdance
description: Hailing from the absurd Xanthan Forest, where the small is big and the big is small, the Armed Criers of Verdance are known for their prowess with nearly any form of arms. Now biding their time, secretly bestowing life upon inanimate things, they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
